// Query results are available as the `data` variable
return formatDataAsArray(data)

template.SOQLQuery:
SELECT Id, Name, StartDate, EndDate, Type
FROM Campaign
WHERE Status = 'In Progress' AND Type like 'Event%'

SELECT Id, CampaignId, FirstName, LastName, Status, Contact.Account.Name, Contact.email, ContactId
FROM CampaignMember
WHERE CampaignId = '{{collectionView1.selectedItem.Id}}'
ORDER By FirstName ASC

SELECT
  Id, 
  Name, 
  Email
FROM
  Contact
WHERE
  Name like '%{{textArea1.value}}%'

template.transformer:
// Query results are available as the `data` variable
